title: Implementing Light/Dark Mode
content: In this blog post, I describe how I implemented the light/dark mode switcher on my portfolio website. The approach uses CSS custom properties to define theme colors, which are toggled using a button with JavaScript.

title: Dynamic Blog Section with JavaScript
content: This post explains how I dynamically loaded and displayed blog posts using JavaScript. The blog posts are fetched from a JSON file and inserted into the HTML of the blog page.
